meanings.definition: Not relating to the structure of the body.
meanings.sent1: The toy robot had a nonanatomic design, with arms coming out of its head.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a nonanatomic sculpture that challenged traditional forms.
meanings.sent3: The nonanatomic puzzle pieces made it impossible to complete the picture.
meanings.sent4: Her nonanatomic approach to problem-solving turned heads in the office.
meanings.sent5: The nonanatomic clouds in the sky resembled fluffy animals.

meanings.definition: Not conforming to the normal structure or arrangement.
meanings.sent1: The nonanatomic building had doors on the roof and windows on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The nonanatomic jigsaw puzzle pieces didn't fit together no matter how hard she tried.
meanings.sent3: His nonanatomic dance moves confused everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The nonanatomic traffic flow caused chaos on the streets.
meanings.sent5: The nonanatomic shadows cast by the streetlights created a surreal atmosphere.
